content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #74498 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
looks like P-critical to me. It's a fairly simple miscompilation on a tier 1 target afaict

I agree with P-critical, this seems really bad:

I originally noticed this when a project that worked on 1.44.1 suddenly started failing with huge memory allocations on 1.45, so this table specifically applies to this repro, not whatever the underlying bug is.
Apparently this is a MSVC-only issue, but I still think it is P-critical
